# scalingo_database_firewall_managed_range (Data Source)

Database firewall managed IP range retrieved from the Database API

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "scalingo_database_firewall_managed_range" "osc_fr1" {
  database_id = scalingo_database.my_db.database_id
  name        = "Scalingo osc-fr1 region"
}

output "managed_range_id" {
  value = data.scalingo_database_firewall_managed_range.osc_fr1.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `database_id` (String) ID of the database
- `name` (String) Name of the managed firewall IP range to look up

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) ID of the managed firewall IP range
